properties.description: Describe and name people, buildings, geographic landmarks and other import features of the item. If the item has been modified in some way, for example, an image has been cropped or a video or audio track has been edited, mention this here.
properties.title: Description

properties.description: The name of the creator, for example the photographer or person who created the video. Do NOT record the person or item depicted in the image, audio track or video in this field. Other examples might be audio editor, interviewer or film editor.
properties.title: Personal Name (Creator)

properties.description: Select a role from this vocabulary - http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators.html - e.g. Artist, Creator, Designer, Engraver, Illustrator, Photographer, Printmaker, etc.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: The corporate name of the creator, for example the organisation that created the item. Do NOT record the person or item depicted in the item in this field.
properties.title: Corporate Name (Creator)

properties.description: Select a role from this vocabulary - http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators.html - e.g. Artist, Creator, Designer, Engraver, Illustrator, Photographer, Printmaker, etc.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: Enter subject keywords to index the item (typically 3-7) from FBA Controlled Vocabulary. Browse the subject keyword display and then type in the first few letters of the term. Select the required term from the autocomplete list.
properties.title: Subject Keywords

properties.description: Enter geographic keywords to index the item from FBA Controlled Vocabulary. Browse the geographic keyword display and then type in the first few letters of the term. Select the required term from the autocomplete list.
properties.title: Geographic Keywords

properties.description: Only enter the scientific name without authority. E.g. Salmo trutta
properties.title: Depicts Taxon

properties.description: Do NOT enter any data in this field.
properties.title: Depicts Person

properties.description: For items that have been created digitally, select "born digital". Otherwise, for items that have been scanned or were originally in tape format select "digitized other analogue".
properties.title: Digital Origin

properties.description: This is the entity publishing the item to the internet. Usually the FBA. If so enter "FBA".
properties.title: Publisher

properties.description: Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Captured

properties.description: Do not enter anything in this field or edit it. The date will be added automatically.
properties.title: Date of Entry

properties.description: Only use this field when there is a need to cater for complex creator relationships. For example, if a work of art is depicted in the image or video and needs further creative role attribution. In the case of an audiio recording, if a podcast was created of multiple interviews, the interviewees are recorded inthe 'Depicts' field, the interviewers are recorded in this field and the editor of the podcast is the creator of the item and so recorded in the 'Personal Name (Creator)' field.
properties.title: Personal Name

properties.description: Select a role from this vocabulary - http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/relators.html - e.g. Artist, Creator, Designer, Engraver, Illustrator, Photographer, Printmaker, etc.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: Only use this field when there is a need to cater for complex creator relationships. For example, in the case where there is a 'Funding Body' involved.
properties.title: Corporate Name

properties.description: If there is no data enter "[n.d.]". Otherwise, enter the year as four digits, e.g. "1996". If no date is given but it can be inferred, put the year in brackes e.g. "[1996]" or alternatively "[after 1996]". If exact dates, down to the specific day are known, record this in the "Description" field. Note that the quotation marks in the above examples should not be entered. Only enter data in this field in these formats.
properties.title: Date Created
